page.title: 10SURVEY OF PLACES OF WORSHIP.
page.content: A small group of pupils discovered that the area was well served by places of worship. All the main denominations were represented. The area covers the three Established Church Parishes of Hale Barns with Ringway, Hale and Ashley. The earliest was found to be the Unitarian Chapel of l723. Most of the other churches had been built within the last one hundred years, the Jewish Synagogue was the most recent. All of these churches looked well cared for and well used. {CHURCH OF ENGLAND ROMAN CATHOLIC. All Saints, H.Barns. Holy Angels,H.B St. Elizabeth,Ashley. St.Emilia Chap. ST. Peters', Hale. {OTHER. {FREE CHURCH. }Synagogue,Hale. United Reform. Hale. The Plymouth Unitarian Chapel.H.B Brethren, (Quaker,H.B).
